runs.comm: starts with a full toss on leg stump, flicked to fine leg for a single
Jayasuriya's away, fullish on middle, chips it wide of mid-on for a couple of runs
tight line, bowled on a good length on the off, gets forward and defends it cautiously back to the bowler
shortish on the off, nips in just a touch, strikes him high on the thighs as he tries to turn the face
angling it away from the right hander, guided down towards third man for a single
full on the off stump, driven straight to mid-off, calls for a single and Jayawardene responds, the throw is to the keeper's end but misses its mark
full and way wide, Jayasuriya doesn't have to reach for that one, called by the umpire
beats him this time as he tries to punch that hard, lands on a good length and whizzes past the outside edge
short of a good length on middle, moves across and hint and taps it back to the bowler
slows it up this time, fullish on middle and leg, worked wide of mid-on for a single
short and wide, slashes hard at that one, misses, would be disappointed he missed out there, but he'll take the wide
straying on the pads, gets across just a touch and flicks it elegantly down to fine leg
Jayasuriya didn't know where that went, banged in short on middle, closed the face on that one but he was surprised by the extra bounce, caught him on the glove and it lobbed up into the off side
banged in short outside off, gets out of the way and allows it through
beaten, angles it away from Jayawardene, short of a good length, Jayawardene thought of playing at it but chose to withdraw, after it had gone past him
picked the length early and cleared the ropes with ease, fraction short on middle and leg, swivelled and pulled it handsomely over deep square leg
he's found fine leg, some more bounce on this delivery, shorter and he tried to pull it behind square, got way too much elevation and not much distance, Steven Smith accepted it gleefully in the deep
fuller, pushed into the leg side towards midwicket
short of a good length on the off, punched off the back foot in front of point
hurled it short on middle, took his bottom hand off that one and knocked it towards square leg
makes room first up, shortish outside off, cracks it wide of a diving point who gets a finger to it and keeps it down to two
full on middle and off, defended solidly towards mid-off

gone! That came onto him quickly, dropped it short on middle and leg, tried to hook it past square leg, was a little late in playing that, it caught the glove and Haddin made no mistake behind the stumps
Almost had Dilshan as well, Tait bangs that one on middle and it takes off, Dilshan shapes up for the pull, it brushes the glove and evades Haddin as he leaps
slower one bowled full on the off, defended towards midwicket
shortish outside off, punched off the back foot towards point
missed run-out, played to point and there is some hesitation in taking the single, there is an aim at the non-striker's end but it misses its target
bowls it on a good length on middle, swings it past a diving square leg into the deep for a couple of runs
doesn't want to restrain himself on that pull shot, short outside off and he misses, too quick
pitched it on a good length on middle, pushed towards mid-off where David Hussey fumbles

he's given him! Jayasuriya tries to swing that across the line, Nannes had bowled it full on middle, the batsman missed and thereafter there was no real doubt as to where that was heading, Australia have the upper hand
he begins well, it's bowled short outside off and he succeeds in pulling it wide of mid-on for a welcome boundary
Dilshan seizes on that pitched-up delivery, enough width for him to caress that between mid-off and extra cover
a length delivery doled out by Watson and Dilshan isn't going to waste these, clears the long-on boundary with one clean strike
held back the length just slightly, crunched towards extra cover
short on middle, pulled away on the bounce to deep square leg
Mathews joins in, Watson's getting smacked, not quite pitched up but in the slot nevertheless as he aims straight, lofts it over the bowler's head for a boundary
misses out, the legcutter by Watson but he fails to pull it through midwicket
shortish outside off, guides it just wide of third man, scampers back for the second
attempted bouncer but it's down the leg side, tries to pull, misses, called a wide

outstanding catch by Cameron White! Short and Dilshan, it seemed, had played a delightful cut, it was uppish and White, stationed at point, flung himself to his left, his wrong side, to clasp that with both hands, superb stuff, it's his day
short of a good length outside off, slashes hard, can't make any contact
came onto him quickly, short of a good length and took off, raps him on the glove as he tries to dab it behind point
tries to punch that off the back foot, gets a thick outside edge towards third man
Australia are on top, pitched up and he sensed an opportunity, was trying to clear extra cover but ended up slicing it straight to David Hussey running in from deep cover
angling it on middle and leg, worked behind square for a single
tries to sweep it down fine, misses, it's a wide down the leg side
flighted on middle, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
full toss on middle, pushed towards long-on for one more
tossed it up on the off, comes down the track and drives it to extra cover
kept it flat this time and held back the length, got forward and defended it to cover
cracked off the front foot towards deep cover for a single
short of a good length on the off, knocks it down in front of cover

edged and superbly stopped at third man, there is a slip in place but it evades him, it's rolling towards the boundary but Daniel Christian, the substitute, dives full length to his left and hauls it back in
dropped, short on middle, goes for the pull, not at all in control, gets a top edge and Clarke, at square leg, chases it running back, dives and tries to snatch it with one hand, can't quite hold on
slower one bowled full outside off, lofted it into that gap between long-off and deep cover for a boundary
shortish outside off, pushed into the deep on the off side for a single
fullish on middle and leg, comes down the track and tries to drive it through midwicket, clips the pads and rolls into the leg side
pushed just wide of extra cover to steal a quick single
flighted on the off, driven through the line to long-off for a single

Haddin had a chance to stump him there, came down the track to drive it into the leg side, got an inside edge onto the pads, rolled into the off side, Haddin collected and tried to flick it back onto the stumps but missed
pushed back slightly uppishly towards the bowler
driven down the ground to long-on for a single
pretty high, bounced it on the off, tried to pull with his feet in the air, missed, one for the over, surprised that wasn't given a wide
short of a length outside off, punched off the back foot to deep cover
shortish on middle, turned through square leg for a single
lands on a good length outside off, tries to crash that over mid-off, gets a thick outside edge to third man
slower one bowled short on the off, dabs it just wide of short third man for a single
low full toss on the off stump which is played back gently to the bowler
flighted on the off, comes down the track and drives it to long-on
makes room and drives it towards long-off for a single
flighted on middle, sweeps it down towards short fine leg
bowled'im! Flat, quicker and bowled full and he failed to connect, tried to force it through the leg side, missed and it crashed into the stumps
cut towards point for a single
pushed to long-off for a single
short on the off, pulled wide of long-on for a couple of runs
finds the boundary, fine leg was a little too square and he beat that fielder, short on leg stump and he swivels to strike that really fine for a boundary
full on middle, driven back to the bowler who palms it off to midwicket
slower one bowled short on the off, cracked towards deep cover for a single

run-out, Nannes may have made a mistake by fumbling at third man but recovered superbly to run out Randiv as he rushed back for the second, picked it up and aimed accurately at the striker's end to beat Randiv's dive, seven down now
short of a good length outside off, makes room and leaves it be
comes down the track and pushes it to extra cover
fullish on the off, plays it with a straight bat
Sri Lanka are sinking now, tossed up, his eyes light up, charges down the track to dismiss him over long-on, it turns away to beat the swing of the bat and Haddin does the rest
shortish, played into the leg side off the back foot
gets forward and defends him confidently into the off side
pushes it full on middle, digs it out back to the bowler
short of a good length from round the wicket, pushed back to the bowler
fullish outside off, makes room to loft that over extra cover, misses
full and wide, makes room to swipe that through cover, misses again
goes past the outside edge again, short, makes room to guide it to third man, makes no contact
full outside off, makes room and plays that with an open face to third man
how did that miss, aiming at the blockhole, almost gets it right as Mendis makes room, misses off stump by a whisker
flighted on the off, pushed straight to extra cover
Malinga holes out, tossed up delivery on the off and he wishes to send it into the stands behind deep midwicket but finds Steve Smith who takes it calmly running a few steps from wide long-on
defends it back to the bowler with a still head
charges down the track to clear mid-off, gets a thick outside edge to point, just the single
played back to the bowler
driven towards long-off to keep the strike
low full toss outside off, driven towards deep point for a single
bowled'im, Australia have thrashed Sri Lanka, full on middle, makes room to strike that over extra cover, misses and the stumps take a beating
